about_the_game:
The Brain Punk Bundle is a set of additional content for in-game use.

Content includes:
- SCARLET NEXUS Digital Artbook & Digital Soundtrack
This includes the full 38-song soundtrack and artwork that built the incredible world of SCARLET NEXUS, including the opening theme song "Dream In Drive".

- Battle Attire Set -Red- costume set for all characters
This includes the additional costume set "Battle Attire Set -Red-" for all characters to use in-game.
